posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. pages.text: /* Profile widget typography tweaks to get a Lei-Mao-like feel: * - Serif name * - Italic, smaller multi-line title * - Respect YAML newlines via `white-space: pre-line` */ @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cormorant+Garamond:ital,wght@0,500;0,600;1,400;1,500&display=swap'); /* Only affect the profile card. */ .card.widget[data-type="profile"] { --profile-serif: "Cormorant Garamond", Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; } /* Name */ .card.widget[data-type="profile"] .card-content > nav.level:first-of-type p.title { font-family: var(--profile-serif); font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.01em; font-size: 1.75rem; /* smaller than default is-size-4 */ line-height: 1.05; margin-bottom: 0.35rem; } /* Title (multi-line) */ .card.widget[data-type="profile"] .card-content > nav.level:first-of-type p.is-size-6.is-block { font-family: var(--profile-serif); font-style: italic; font-weight: 500; font-size: 1.1rem; line-height: 1.25; white-space: pre-line; /* make YAML newlines render as line breaks */ margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0.35rem; } /* Location */ .card.widget[data-type="profile"] .card-content > nav.level:first-of-type p.is-size-6.is-flex { /* Match reference: location is larger and not italic, with normal theme font */ font-family: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1.25rem; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0; } .card.widget[data-type="profile"] .card-content > nav.level:first-of-type p.is-size-6.is-flex i { font-size: 1.15em; } /* Center align like the reference screenshot. */ .card.widget[data-type="profile"] .card-content > nav.level:first-of-type .level-item.has-text-centered { text-align: center !important; } .card.widget[data-type="profile"] .card-content > nav.level:first-of-type figure.image { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; }
